incidents.title: AdamRMS down for maintenance to database
incidents.description: In order to support multiple currencies, AdamRMS is down for a database upgrade
incidents.content:
2020-06-09T22:30:00.007Z
Resolved

Build v1.12.02 has entered production, maintenance is now completed

2020-06-09T22:14:00.007Z
Ongoing

The migration took longer than expected due to issues encountered adjusting the asset editing functionality. The migration is now complete and the caches are now being rebuilt which should be resolved by 22:30 UTC.

2020-06-09T15:47:00.347Z
Ongoing

The migration is taking longer than expected - downtime duration is revised to continue until 18:30 UTC

incidents.title: AdamRMS Homepage not displaying correctly
incidents.description: We've detected a problem with the cache meaning the project view displays instead of the homepage
incidents.content:
Project view displaying instead of homepage

2020-04-06T16:00:27.347Z
Resolved

Tweak applied and cache regenerating

2020-04-06T15:20:27.347Z
Monitoring

The broken component has been located and a fix is being developed
